title: Child Individual Webpage Creation Project: Strengthening Mathematical Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Fundamental Web Interface Operation Skills
context.additional_context: A non-structured after-school project-based learning program where practicing math professionals expand their practical skills by creating educational content for children

learning_goals: Learners can create child-friendly math concept explanation webpages using basic HTML/CSS syntax
Learners can produce three or more types of digital content that visually represent mathematical concepts through web-based information gathering
Learners can iteratively improve and revise webpages at least twice incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
